description:
A containment breach was declared in the Aegis Research Facility, caused by a Class 4 or above UT of unknown type.

The Special Response Team is sent in as part of a contingency plan. You play as Specter 8 and must maintain radio contact at all time with Morpho, your operator.

PLAY WITH HEADPHONES. THIS GAME REQUIRES STEREO OUTPUT.

This is a short horror adventure where you role-play as a hardened Spec Op making his way through the dark hell that became the underground facility.

Controls

  • Left and Right arrows or A and D to move
  • Down or S to use elevator
  • Tab to use the radio
  • Space to shoot

Attributions - Music

Hush by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4986-hush License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
